llm_res.rule: The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
Adding non-standard functions and events can lead to confusion and interoperability issues. ERC20 functions and events should adhere to the standard.
The approve function should allow a spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the value amount. If this function is called again, it overwrites the current allowance with the value.
llm_res.function: increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance in ERC20 contract
